formalpara.title: Review the Cleanroom Engineering Guide for agreement
formalpara.para: Review the Cleanroom Engineering Guide with project team and peer groups to obtain commitments to Cleanroom processes and team performance objectives.

glossdef.para: Review the Cleanroom Engineering Guide with the customer. Modify and rereview as necessary to obtain concurrence.

formalpara.title: Review the Software Development Plan for agreement
formalpara.para: Review the Software Development Plan with the project team and peer groups to obtain commitments to project plans and schedules.

glossdef.para: Review the Software Development Plans with the customer. Modify and rereview as necessary to obtain concurrence.
